org.syntaxes.fortress

Class ChatHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.syntaxes.fortress.ChatHandler

  • public class ChatHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all of the chat stuff. If there's a command, it sends it off to CommandHandler.class
    Author:
    ABrambleNinja

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.List<User> userList
      Contains a list of all the "User"s connected.

      ChatHandler()

      static void addUser(java.net.Socket userSocket, User user, java.lang.String nickname)
      Adds a user to the User list and sends a message to everyone on as well as console.
      static void chat(java.lang.String input, User sender)
      Handles chat, and if the chat message starts with a '.', it sends it to CommandHandler.class

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Does nothing. Not sure if necessary, but scared to remove it.

      • sendRaw

        public static void sendRaw(java.lang.String toSend)
        Sends a message to everyone on the chat server, except console. Will eventually have a boolean called logToConsole, and setting it to "true" will have it write it to console, obviously.
        Parameters:
        toSend - The message to send.

      • sendRaw

        public static void sendRaw(java.lang.String toSend,
           User sendTo)
        Sends a message to a certain user on the chat room.
        Parameters:
        toSend - The message to send.
        sendTo - The user to send it to.

      • sendRaw

        public static void sendRaw(java.lang.String toSend,
           java.net.Socket sendTo)
        Sends a message to a certain socket on the chat room. Used for when a user first connects and is not a User yet.
        Parameters:
        toSend - The message to send.
        sendTo - The socket to send it to.

      • addUser

        public static void addUser(java.net.Socket userSocket,
           User user,
           java.lang.String nickname)
        Adds a user to the User list and sends a message to everyone on as well as console.
        Parameters:
        userSocket - The socket the user is on.
        user - An arbirtrary User variable that gets added.
        nickname - The nickname the user requested.

      • removeUser

        public static void removeUser(User user)
        Removes a user from the list and announces that they disconnected.
        Parameters:
        user - The user to remove.

      • chat

        public static void chat(java.lang.String input,
        User sender)
        Handles chat, and if the chat message starts with a '.', it sends it to CommandHandler.class
        Parameters:
        input - The message the user typed in
        sender - The user that sent it. Eventually will be Object that is an instanceof either User or Console.
